problem.markdown:
As you've read, simulations can be used in a tremendous number of applications, including scientific discovery, product planning, and education. Which of the following activities benefit the least from simulation? ( ) Preparing soldiers for combat situations. ( ) Forecasting the weather for later in the week. (x) Finding a time to meet up with friends to work on a group project. ( ) Predicting the spread of a contagious virus. ( ) Estimating how the long-term use of a new fertilizer will affect a field and the surrounding area.
[explanation] Right; this task probably doesn't need to be solved for many different contexts. [explanation]
